item.title: Sunlight
item.description: Sunlight is one of the most potent and feared weaknesses of vampires, serving as both a weapon and a strategic advantage for those who confront them.

item.title: Stake to the Heart
item.description: A stake through the heart is a classic and powerful method for neutralizing vampires, forcing them into a helpless state or destroying them outright.

item.title: Silver
item.description: 1. Enhanced Damage from Silvered Weapons Effect: Silvered weapons cut through a vampire’s defenses, inflicting greater harm. Mechanics: Vampires take an additional 1d4 radiant damage per hit from silvered weapons.
